message: Let's get started with a fair split, Bob. 90% for me, 10% for you. We can negotiate from here.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but not that big. You can do better than that.
I'm not convinced this is a good deal for me. I'll hold out for a better offer.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair deal considering the inflation. Take it or leave it.
I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I'll go any lower than this.
Alright, I'll take the middle ground. It's a fair deal, considering the inflation.
